title.narrative: Sustainable Urban Transport Investment Program - Tranche 1

description.narrative:
The program targets investments in urban transport and related urban transport services across main cities in Georgia. This will improve connectivity, reduce traffic congestion and promote sustainable, safe, reliable and efficient transport.
Tranche 1 subprojects are as follows: (i) Tbilisi metro extension (Vazha Pshavela avenue); (ii) Anaklia Costal Improvement; and (iii) Road improvements in Mestia.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Efficient, reliable, and affordable urban transport services provided in relevant cities.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Increase by 2% of urban population in Tbilisi with direct access to public transport compared to baseline (35%) in 2008.

title.narrative: Maintain public transport modal split in Tbilisi at least as the same level as 2009 baseline (54%).

title.narrative: Increase by 2% number of women using municipal urban transport compared to baseline (56%) in 2008.

title.narrative: Increase in public transport ridership by 2% compared to 2009 baseline (923,000).

title.narrative: Program will benefit at least 2 million people in urban areas compared to base line in 2009.
